original_text: and because he was of the same trade he stayed with them and worked, for they were tentmakers by trade.
korean_text: 생업이 같으므로 함께 살며 일을 하니 그 생업은 천막을 만드는 것이더라

sentences.original_text: and because he was of the same trade
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 같은 직업을 가졌기 때문에

sentences.original_text: for they were tentmakers by trade
